pages.title: P-Buddysteel Gear
pages.text: Perfect Buddysteel gear is a more powerful version of buddysteel gear. It upgrades at the same rate as Buddysteel, but is always one level above it, meaning both it's initial and final power level are more powerful. It is made using a smithing table, buddysteel gear, and a perfect buddysteel ingot.

pages.title: Enchantments
pages.text: Because of the cards that helped form the perfect buddysteel, the armor can be enchanted with Buddy Binding, as well as all other armor enchantments you'd expect.
